Mapcolonies : Authentication

Created by Shlomi Koncha, last modified by Asaf Masa on Mar 08, 2022

Introduction

In order to make requests either as a service or a client, you will need to identify yourself with a token.

You will get a token for our services as part of the initial integration process. If you do not have a token, please <contact us>. Once you have the token, it will be used in every request to our services.

The token will enable you to access our services in accordance to the permissions that were given to you.

Usage

When making any request, you need to add a special header in which you supply the token.

See usage with different applications:

  • pycsw: Catalog Authentication Usage Examples

  • mapproxy: Mapproxy Authentication Usage Examples
